thread.section_title: The Surrey - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Delightful boutique style hotel
thread.title_full: Delightful boutique style hotel - Review of The Surrey, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Alan G
title: Delightful boutique style hotel
text: Staff make it.. they couldnt be more helpful and friendly. One bedroom suite comforable with a great bed and linens.. others could learn from it. Nice bar with live jazz on Friday with a great cocktail and drinks selection with good canapes etc. Definite home from home feel..
